Package com.googlecode.lanterna.gui2

Interface InteractableRenderer<T extends Component & Interactable>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of the component this InteractableRenderer is designed for
    All Superinterfaces:
    ComponentRenderer<T>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Button.ButtonRenderer, TableRenderer<V>, TextBox.TextBoxRenderer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractListBox.DefaultListBoxRenderer, Button.BorderedButtonRenderer, Button.DefaultButtonRenderer, Button.FlatButtonRenderer, CheckBox.CheckBoxRenderer, CheckBox.DefaultCheckBoxRenderer, ComboBox.ComboBoxRenderer, ComboBox.DefaultComboBoxRenderer, DefaultTableRenderer, MenuItem.DefaultMenuItemRenderer, MenuItem.MenuItemRenderer, TextBox.DefaultTextBoxRenderer

    public interface InteractableRenderer<T extends Component & Interactable>
extends ComponentRenderer<T>
    Extended interface for component renderers used with interactable components. Because only the renderer knows what the component looks like, the component itself cannot know where to place the text cursor, so this method is instead delegated to this interface that extends the regular component renderer.
    Author:
    Martin
